title: RC4 Encryption
description: RC4 stream cipher, encryption and decryption use the same operation
securityWarning: Security Warning: RC4 has known vulnerabilities and has been removed from TLS 1.3. Only recommended for legacy compatibility or educational purposes.
howItWorksDesc: RC4 is a stream cipher that generates a pseudo-random byte stream from the key, then XORs it with the plaintext. Due to the properties of XOR, encryption and decryption use exactly the same operation.
